about.headline: Collective awareness for air quality
about.aim: The hackAIR project aims at building an open technology platform that you can use to access, collect and improve air quality information in Europe.
about.did_you_know: Did you know that 90% of Europeans living in cities are exposed to levels of air pollution deemed damaging to human health?
about.knowing_about_aq: Knowing more about air quality is the first step to improving it.
about.reduce_your_exposure: Reduce your exposure to air pollution: choose to go outside when and where the air is fresh
about.avoid_polluting: Avoid polluting behaviours: travel smart and breathe more easily
about.take_part: Connect with others and ask policy makers to take steps for better air quality
about.join_the_movement: Join the movement to improve air quality in Europe

how_it_works.open_technology_platform: Open technology platform to access, collect and improve information on air quality
how_it_works.web_app_desc: A customisable web application for local air quality information
how_it_works.mobile_app_desc: Access personalised air quality information and contribute measurements from mobile images
how_it_works.mobile_photos_desc: Use hackAIR's app to access air quality information and to contribute measurements from mobile images.
how_it_works.open_sensors_desc: Measuring air quality is not just for professionals. With a few electronics components, you can build your own air quality sensor in an afternoon.
how_it_works.low_tech_desc: An easy way to provide measurements of air pollution using cardboard, grease and a bit of time.
how_it_works.open_datasets_desc: hackAIR displays air quality data from a variety of sources. Learn how to use the hackAIR API to contribute your own air quality data - or to access hackAIR's data automatically.
how_it_works.access_recommendations: Access personalised recommendations and contribute to the platform

disclaimers.disclaimer_measurements: This index is only a qualitative representation of the ambient air quality, and is still in experimental stage. Reports, studies and other scientific interpretations should only be performed by using established measurement methodologies.
disclaimers.disclaimer_recommendations: These recommendations do not constitute a medical or emergency advice. Please only use them for informational purposes.
disclaimers.disclaimer_quality_history: The current index was calculated from all the available data sources for the city centre.
disclaimers.disclaimer_unsupportedcity: Currently we do not estimate the air quality index for this city. You can though check the map for other users' contributions and upload your own measurements!

testmission_0.increase_strength_profile: Increase the strength of your profile.
testmission_0.msg_set_account: Let’s set up your account, shall we? As a hacker, you need a home base from which you can operate. This should be your profile where you can see all the important data. Let's set it up!

testmission_1.msg_prove_envi_sensi: Prove your environmental sensitivities by using three different means of public transport in a week.

testmission_2.msg_cycling_city: Prove your environmental sensitivities by cycling in the city.

testmission_3.msg_walking: Prove your environmental sensitivities by walking.

testmission_4.msg_running: Prove your environmental sensitivities by using running.
